item.source: Wrong slot for a item o.0 please help

item.title: Wrong slot for a item o.0 please help
item.dc:creator: @brenda brenda
item.description:
@brenda wrote:

ok to fix. you need to go to ur Item.java and ur Item4.java

u have to add their ID# to the appropriate area.
Example:
Special Cape when worn goes into weapon slot. (cape id=11111)
go to item.java look where it says where the capes go, add code 11111 to that area. save
go to item4.java and do same
compile server
run and load =). YAY congratz on ur shield and other items =)

Read full topic
